Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含的屬性可用於限制 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合。

span.span: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 包含的屬性可用來限制 方法針對 使用之資料庫中的追蹤資料所傳回的 物件集合。A contains properties that are used to constrain the set of objects returned by the method against the tracking data in a database used by the . 由呼叫 傳回的 物件集合中的每個 必須對應工作流程執行個體，該執行個體在資料庫中有與它關聯的追蹤資料，而資料庫須符合 的屬性指定的條件。Each in the collection of objects returned by a call to must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||。.| ||。.| ||空的 。An empty .| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| 這些值指定呼叫 時，應該為資料庫中有追蹤資料的每個工作流程執行個體傳回 物件。These values specify that a call to should return a object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 類別的執行個體。The following example demonstrates creating an instance of the class. 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器範例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||。.| ||。.| ||空的 。An empty .| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| 這些值指定呼叫 時，應該為資料庫中有追蹤資料的每個工作流程執行個體傳回 物件。These values specify that a call to should return a object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime StatusMaxDateTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，指定時段上限。這個值與 一起用於限制呼叫 時傳回的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with , is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: ，指定用於比對工作流程執行個體與 指定之狀態的時段上限。

span.span: A that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合限制在具備下列條件的工作流程執行個體： 如 所指定；狀態如 所指定，而且介於 和 指定的範圍內；擷取的資料至少符合 指定的其中一個 物件。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 指定的 值是內含值。The value specified by is inclusive. 如需工作流程執行個體之狀態比對方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `WorkflowStatus` 設定為 null，則 `StatusMaxDateTime` 和 `StatusMinDateTime` 會被忽略。If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored. 呼叫 `GetWorkflows` 時會傳回所有工作流程執行個體。All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called. ## Examples 下列範例示範設定 StatusMaxDateTime 屬性。The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMaxDateTime property. 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器範例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#128](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#128)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，這個值與 一起用於限制呼叫 時傳回的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a that, together with , is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: ，指定用於比對工作流程執行個體與 指定之狀態的時段下限。

span.span: A that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合限制在具備下列條件的工作流程執行個體： 如 所指定；狀態如 所指定，而且介於 和 指定的範圍內；擷取的資料至少符合 指定的其中一個 物件。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 指定的 值是內含值。The value specified by is inclusive. 如需工作流程執行個體之狀態比對方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `WorkflowStatus` 設定為 null，則 `StatusMaxDateTime` 和 `StatusMinDateTime` 會被忽略。If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored. 呼叫 `GetWorkflows` 時會傳回所有工作流程執行個體。All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called. ## Examples 下列範例示範設定 StatusMinDateTime 屬性。The following example demonstrates setting the StatusMinDateTime property. 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器範例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrackingDataItems As IList(Of TrackingDataItemValue)

summary.span: 取得或設定資料擷取值的清單，這些值用於限制由呼叫 傳回的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 物件的 ，其中包含將用於比對擷取自工作流程執行個體之資料的指定值，或 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: A of objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合限制在具備下列條件的工作流程執行個體： 如 所指定；狀態如 所指定，而且介於 和 指定的範圍內；擷取的資料至少符合 指定的其中一個 物件。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 或 可包含內有擷取自工作流程之資料的 記錄。 or can contain records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow. 屬性包含 物件，指定此擷取資料的特定值。The property contains objects that specify certain values for this extracted data. 如果工作流程執行個體符合 指定的其他條件，而且 不是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，則儲存在工作流程執行個體的資料庫中的擷取資料必須符合 屬性指定的一或多個擷取資料值，該屬性屬於針對工作流程執行個體傳回的 物件。If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by and is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the property for a object to be returned for the workflow instance. 如果 是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，傳回的 物件集合將不會受到資料庫中，任何工作流程執行個體之擷取資料值的限制。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property WorkflowStatus As Nullable(Of WorkflowStatus)

public: property Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> WorkflowStatus { Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，用於限制呼叫 時值回的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 其中一個 值或 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: One of the values or null ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合限制在具備下列條件的工作流程執行個體： 如 所指定；狀態如 所指定，而且介於 和 指定的範圍內；擷取的資料至少符合 指定的其中一個 物件。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 如果在指定的時間範圍內或之前最後一次收到的工作流程執行個體 的 屬性設定為 值，而且對應至 指定的 值，則工作流程執行個體會被視為擁有符合 的狀態。A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches if the last received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its property set to a value that maps to the value specified by . 因此，工作流程執行個體的 必須有針對適當 值設定的 。Therefore, the for the workflow instance must have a that is configured for the appropriate value. 只有已送入工作流程追蹤記錄的 才能被比對。Only values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched. 如果尚未為工作流程執行個體送出任何工作流程追蹤記錄，該工作流程執行個體會被視為有 的狀態。If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of . 下表顯示 值和 值之間的對應。The following table shows the mapping between values and values. |TrackingWorkflowEvent 值TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus 值WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| 如果 為 null (`Nothing`)，傳回的 物件集合將不受狀態限制，也就是說，只要工作流程執行個體符合 其他屬性指定的參數，就會傳回 物件。If is null (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of . ## Examples 下列範例示範設定 WorkflowStatus 屬性。The following example demonstrates setting the WorkflowStatus property. 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 工作流程監視器範例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#128](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#128)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ WorkflowType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.WorkflowType : Type with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定工作流程執行個體 ，用於限制呼叫 時值回的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the workflow instance that is used to constrain the set of objects returned by a call to .

value.span: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將 的呼叫所傳回的 物件集合限制在具備下列條件的工作流程執行個體： 如 所指定；狀態如 所指定，而且介於 和 指定的範圍內；擷取的資料至少符合 指定的其中一個 物件。 constrains the set of objects returned by a call to to those workflow instances that have the specified by , that have the status specified by during the period specified by and , and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the objects specified by . 如果 為 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，傳回的 物件集合將不受工作流程 限制，也就是說，只要工作流程執行個體符合 其他屬性指定的參數，就會傳回 物件。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of objects returned will not be constrained by workflow ; in other words, a object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of .
